question: Spain and which country have been named co-hosts of the 2022 Women's Hockey World Cup?
explanation: India will host the 2023 Men\'s Hockey World Cup from 13th to 29th of January. While, Spain and the Netherlands have been named as the co-hosts of the 2022 Women\'s World Cup scheduled to be held from 1st to 22nd of July.The decisions were made during FIH\'s Executive Board Meeting in Lausanne, Switzerland on 9th November 2019.
